  3. City Council

City Council

The legislative and governing body of the City of Dickinson consists of a mayor and six (6) councilmembers known as the City Council. The mayor and all councilmembers are elected from the city at large; the City of Dickinson does not have council "districts". Each member of council represents the entire city.


Members

  • Travis Magliolo, Mayor
  • Johnnie Simpson, Jr, Position Number 1
  • M. Shaun Holt, Position Number 2
  • Mark Townsend, Position Number 3
  • Scott Shrader, Position Number 4
  • Bill Schick, Position Number 5
  • Kevin Edmonds, Position Number 6

Meetings

  • 7 p.m.
  • 2nd & 4th Tuesdays of each month (as of June 24, 2025)
  • City Hall
    4403 Highway 3
    Dickinson, TX 77539

Agendas & Minutes

Agendas are available prior to the meetings. Minutes are available following approval.

View Most Recent Agendas and Minutes


All agenda, minutes, and other related materials will be accessible when available.
